Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "tests fail from clean environment" (#7130) at vuejs/vue
Events.RelatedBody:
### Version
2.5.8

### Reproduction link
[https://github.com/vuejs/vue/blob/dev/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/blob/dev/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md) (meta-issue)

### Steps to reproduce
Opened up a fresh terminal and typed this in:

``` bash
git clone https://github.com/vuejs/vue
cd vue
npm i
npm run setup
npm test
```

### What is expected?
All tests should be passing. I might be confused on the development process, but the [contribution file](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/blob/dev/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md) says "make sure `npm test` passes", under "Pull Request Guidelines", so I would expect `npm test` to pass on a fresh pull

### What is actually happening?
This is the tail of `npm test`:

```
Finished in 25.953 secs / 25.514 secs @ 21:13:50 GMT 0100 (CET)

SUMMARY:
✔ 1056 tests completed
✖ 1 test failed

FAILED TESTS:
  Transition mode
    ✖ transition out-in on async component (resolve after leave complete)
      PhantomJS 2.1.1 (Linux 0.0.0)
    Expected 1 to be 0.
    webpack:///test/unit/features/transition/transition-mode.spec.js:480:44 <- index.js:159373:44
    shift@webpack:///test/helpers/wait-for-update.js:24:32 <- index.js:95787:36


=============================== Coverage summary ===============================
Statements   : 99.98% ( 4110/4111 )
Branches     : 94.67% ( 3340/3528 )
Functions    : 99.82% ( 568/569 )
Lines        : 99.98% ( 4004/4005 )
================================================================================
npm ERR! code ELIFECYCLE
npm ERR! errno 1
npm ERR! vue@2.5.8 test:cover: `karma start test/unit/karma.cover.config.js`
npm ERR! Exit status 1
npm ERR! 
npm ERR! Failed at the vue@2.5.8 test:cover script.
npm ERR! This is probably not a problem with npm. There is likely additional logging output above.

npm ERR! A complete log of this run can be found in:
npm ERR!     /home/user/.npm/_logs/2017-11-25T20_13_50_659Z-debug.log
npm ERR! Test failed.  See above for more details.
```


---
I doubt someone forgot to fix some code before AND the tools didn't pick it up AND the PR was accepted, so it's probably got to do with my environment. I'm running Ubuntu on i3wm, using fish shell, both of which might maybe not be considered in the test cases in some way. What should be done about this?

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "Store is not a constructor" (#1068) at vuejs/vuex
Events.RelatedBody:
### Version
3.0.0

### Reproduction link
[https://codesandbox.io/s/jpjq08vzv9](https://codesandbox.io/s/jpjq08vzv9)

### Steps to reproduce
Install npm dependancies and run webpack.

### What is expected?
See vue homepage with hello world message

### What is actually happening?
The bug doesn't appear on sandbox but on my local machine I've following error : O is not a constructor.
This bug concerns new Vuex.Store line.
